title: BBQ/Picnic Area, Playground, Newly Renovated *ONE MONTH FREE AVA AUG*
posting_body: ['9959 E Peakview Ave, Englewood, CO 80111', 'Avery Park Apartments in Englewood, CO 80111 is a beautiful community located 25 minutes from downtown Denver and less than 5 minutes from I-25.', 'Our lovely apartment homes come equipped with washers and dryers, private patios or balconies, kitchens with pantries, wood burning fireplaces, large closet space and wood style floors in select homes.', 'Avery Park is a pet friendly community featuring a 24 hour fitness center, swimming pool, playground, barbecue picnic area, on-site recycling and complimentary coffee.', 'We are located near the Denver Tech Center, less than 10 minutes from Park Meadows Mall and less than five miles from C-470 and I-225.', 'Avery Park promotes healthy living by offering a smoke free environment.', 'Apartment Features:', 'Large Closets', 'Patio/Balcony', 'Fully Equipped Kitchens', 'Ceiling Fan', 'Newly Renovated Apartments', 'Vinyl Wood Plank Flooring', 'Refrigerator', 'Disposal', 'Plush Carpeting in Bedrooms', 'Cable Ready', 'Community Features:', 'BBQ/Picnic Area', 'On-Site Management', 'Clubhouse', 'Fitness Center', 'Off Street Parking', 'Outdoor Multi-Sport Court', 'Pool', 'Yoga Room', 'Playground', 'On-Site Maintenance', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
